name: Going Postal
description:
Welcome to Dreamsdale, the happiest micro-planet in the aether!

As our newly-appointed Postie, it'll be your job to sort and deliver all of our charming little letters. You'll be the one entirely responsible for connecting our wonderful citizens!

We can trust you not to read the mail, of course... And you wouldn't even think about delivering letters to the wrong house! That would just be silly.

We hope you enjoy your stay in our idyllic little world!

Made very casually for Ludum Dare 30 in 48 hours by Team StarBabies!

Design/Story by Mark Boyde Shaw
Artwork by Amelia George
Programming/Story by Sean Oxspring
Music by Will Bryce
